Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (Pataikos)
Description: Small amulet in the shape of a Pataikos in the traditional stance: spread out legs and arms, hands on the stomach and a scarab on the head. There is a suspension hole across the back of the head. The small base is flat and rectangular.
